channel.title: Check if st2.user contains a character as part of when statement
channel.description:
in Orquesta yaml wf, is there a way to have something like this: ```yaml - when: <%failed and ctx().st2.user.startswith("test") %> ```
purpose is to be able to check if the st2.user response has a particular character in it, in this case "test"
